title: Refunding
body: Why am I not able to refund a champion (Trundle) that I had bought with IP 10 days ago? After playing him a few games I realized I didn't like him all that much, and now I am unable to refund him. Any ideas? Could it be that I have a skin that I unboxed from a loot crate and made it permanent?

replies.body: if you have a skin for the champ then the champ is non refundable im sorry :( the rioter didnt meantion that but you cant refund him if you own a skin of his

You should be able to refund trundle, so long as you have a refund token available. You can find out more regarding refunds in our [**Content Refund FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

If you have any other questions, let me know.
